remarks: The interval between any two points of a continuous real function is contained in the range of the function.  Equivalently, the range of a continuous real function is convex.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)

ivthicc.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A [,] B ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. RR ) $.
